Class Square

java.lang.Object
Square
Direct Known Subclasses:
EstateSquare, NormalSquare, WallSquare
public abstract class Square
extends java.lang.Object
Square is an abstract class representing each square on the Board of Murder Madness. Each Square has a position. Square is extended by NormalSquare, WallSquare, and EstateSquare.
Author:
johnh

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int col
    Square's column on board grid.
    int row
    Square's row on board grid.
    static int SIZE
    Square size when displaying.
    static int WALL
    Wall size (used for EstateSquares on edge of Estates).
